feed.title: Mosam Dabhi
feed.subtitle:
I am a PhD student at the Robotics Institute, Carnegie Mellon University (CMU) where I investigate causality within machine learning, and geometrical priors within computer vision.
Previously, I finished my Masters at CMU with Simon Lucey.
In my opinion: "AI could enable the creation of a versatile language through which all the existing scientific fields could be expressed."
